bug.author: Paperone80
bug.summary: Adding label with quotation is successful but does not allow any labels after
bug.description:
Hi, I can successfully add the following label and it is also showing in the UI: label ~radio=labelattributes:"yes","missing","can't tell" However, adding any subsequent label via 'Update Task' results in the following error:
Task update error. No closing quotation
I am using cvat github version from 2018-11-19.

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Paperone80>@Paperone80</denchmark-link> , Thanks for your report. It is a bug due to "can't" word with apostrophe. We are going to fix it. Don't hesitate to send us a PR with the fix.
